items.name: Bendakaya Pulusu
items.description: Okra curry from the state of Andra Pradesh. Okra fried and cooked with tamarind, tomato; tempered with different spices and garnished with curry leaves and coconut.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + papad + side salad + achar

items.name: Munakkaya Mamsam
items.description: A dish from the state of Andhra Pradesh. Lamb cooked with drumsticks, ginger-garlic paste, onions and warm spices giving this dish its desired taste.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 chapatis + papad + side salad + achar

items.name: Vada Pav
items.description: A famous veggie burger from the streets of Mumbai. The patty is made of boiled potatoes mixed with spices, coated in chickpea flour and fried to perfection. This is stuffed in a bun smeared with spicy green chutney and dry garlic chutney. (2 vada pav)

items.name: Sarva Pindi
items.description: A dish from Telangana. Lentil mixed with rice flour, chillies, garlic and spices, mixed together and flattened and cooked on a pan. Served with a side of onion tomato chutney. (4 pieces)

items.name: Aloo ka Rassawala Shaak
items.description: A recipe from the state of Rajasthan. Potatoes cooked in a flavourful yogurt based gravy with spices, and curry leaves and topped with corriander leaves.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Chicken Korma
items.description: Chicken cooked with caramalised onions, nuts, yogurt, ginger, garlic and other spices
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Peri-Peri Anda Bhurji Wrap
items.description: Scambled eggs cooked with onion, tomato and spices and stuffed in between flaky flatbread with peri-peri mayonnaise, onion, corrinader and spices and wrapped together. Served with a side of peri-peri mayo dip.

items.name: Thalipeet
items.description: Flatbread made of mixed grain flour with spices & onions. A very heathy meal served with tangy onion & tomato chutney. (4 thalipeet)

items.name: Soya Chunk Masala
items.description: Soya chunks cooked with onion & tomato based tangy-spicy gravy with fresh ground spices topped with fresh corriander
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Egg Roast
items.description: A popular south Indian dish, from the state of Kerala. Made with boiled eggs and then cooking them in spicy masala with onions, tomatoes, ginger, garlic and a blend of  spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Rava Paniyaram
items.description: Rava Paniyaram is a popular South Indian breakfast dish made by steaming fermented batter made of semolina (rava), lentils and yogurt. Served with chutney. (7 pieces)

items.name: Dhaba Style Dal Kichidi
items.description: Rice, lentils, onion, tomato, ginger, garlic & chilli pressure cooked together and tempered with different spices for the flavourful taste. Served with papad. A complete comfort meal.

items.name: Gatte ka Pulao
items.description: Steamed and seasoned gram flour dumplings, mixed with rice and peas and variety of spices. Served with a side of yogurt raita + papad

items.name: Safed Maas
items.description: A mildly spiced Rajasthani dish made of lamb cooked in a creamy, yogurt based gravy with a special blend of spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with some steamed rice/2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Mix Vegetable Suji Handvo
items.description: Mix veg handvo is a traditional and popular savory cake from Gujarat, made from a fermented batter of various lentils and mixed vegetables such as bottle gourd, carrots, beans, and spinach. Served with chutney or yogurt.

items.name: Lemon Rice
items.description: Rice, cashews, chillies and other spices stir fried together and mixed with lime juice. Served with achar and papad

items.name: Veg Hakka Noodles
items.description: Indo-Chinese dish with assorted veggies cooked with chinese sauces and noodles
items.extra: make it special with some veg manchurian gravy

items.name: Chicken Hakka Noodles
items.description: Indo-Chinese dish with assorted veggies and chicken cooked with chinese sauces and noodles.
items.extra: make it special with some chicken manchurian gravy

items.name: Khandvi
items.description: A batter made of gram flour, yogurt and spices spread into thin layers, rolled into small spiral and steamed.

items.name: Bisi Bele Bath
items.description: A popular and traditional dish from Karnataka. A combination of rice, lentils and vegetables cooked together with a special blend of spices which gives its unique flavor.

items.name: Paneer Angara
items.description: A north Indian dish made with Indian cottage, onion and capsicum marinated in hung curd and variety of spices, smoked and cooked in a thicky gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Chicken Handi
items.description: A traditional dish from north India made with marinated pieces of chicken cooked in a thick tomato-based sauce with a variety of spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice/2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Mix vegetable pancake
items.description: A dish made by mixing grated or finely chopped vegetables like carrots, bell peppers, zucchini, onion and cabbage with flour, yogurt and spices. Served with a side of onion tomato chutney. (4 pancakes)

items.name: Chicken Tehari
items.description: One pot chicken rice cooked with caramalised onion, tomato, ginger-garlic paste and fresh garam masala

items.name: Mushroom Ghee Roast
items.description: A Manglorean dish made by sauteing sliced mushrooms in ghee with a mix of Indian spices and then roasted until mushrooms get a cispy outer layer.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Chicken Ghee Roast
items.description: Manglorean chicken dish cooked with ghee, onion and dried red chili paste and garnished with fresh corriander
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Bhel Puri
items.description: Street style snack of puffed rice mixed with spicy chutney, sweet tangy chutney, papadi, sev, onion, tomato and fresh coriander making it a flavourful snack.

items.name: Idiyappam & Kadala Curry
items.description: A rice noodle dish from the south of India. Made of steamed rice flour noodles. Served with black chickpea curry.

items.name: Kashmiri Rajma Masala
items.description: Red kidney beans in a tomato based gravy with variey of spices. A dish from the state of Jammu and Kashmir.
items.extra: make a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Dhaniwal Korma
items.description: A delicious dish from the state of Kashmir. Lamb meat cooked with yogurt, ginger, garlic, coriander powder and other spices; slow cooked for a few hours.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Rajma Tikki
items.description: A north Indian street food dish made by mashing cooked red kidney beans and then forming them into patties, which are shallow fried. Served with spicy green chutney. (4 tikkis)

items.name: Gujrati Dal Rice
items.description: A traditional dal dish from Gujarat, made with a combination of lentils, such as toor dal, chana dal, and moong dal, and seasoned with ginger, garlic, cumin, coriander, and other spices. Served with rice.

items.name: Veg Jaipuri
items.description: A dish from rajasthan is made with a mix of vegetables cooked together with red chili and tomato paste
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Junglee Maas
items.description: A dish from Rajasthan. A traditional spicy lamb dish which is cooked with a combination of aromatic spices and yogurt.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Sweet Potato Tikki
items.description: Spiced sweet potato patty shallow fried and served with spicy green chutney. (4 tikkis)

items.name: Tomato Rice
items.description: Rice cooked with onions & tomato, tempered with mustard seeds, peanuts and fresh curry leaves. Served with papad.

items.name: Veg Chowmein
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish made with assorted veggies cooked together with rice and noodles with flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.

items.name: Chicken Chowmein
items.description: Assorted veggies and chicken stir fried and cooked together with rice and noodles with flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.

items.name: Dhokla
items.description: Dhokla is a traditional Gujarati dish made from a fermented batter of chickpea flour, rice flour and yogurt or curd. Steamed and then cut into small, square pieces.

items.name: Palak Lasun kichidi
items.description: A dish made by cooking rice and lentils with spinach and garlic. It is a flavorful, healthy and nutritious dish, that is often enjoyed as a main course. Served with yogurt and achar.
